en.description: Hello, I'm Antonio Souza, a Web Developer at Compass Uol with 4 years of experience in the technology market. Currently, I'm in my final year of graduation in Information Systems at the University of S√£o Paulo. My passion for web development led me to specialize in front-end technologies like Vue and React. I'm a curious and enthusiastic learner who constantly seeks to expand my knowledge. In addition to Vue and React, I have experience working with AEM, Node.js, Java, AWS, Meteor.js, Angular, and other tools. My current focus is on studying Cloud Computing and data analysis to enhance my skillset. During my career, I've worked on challenging projects that have honed my problem-solving and teamwork skills. I'm a committed and organized professional who strives to keep learning and growing.
en.madeinweb-1: MadeinWeb is a company specialized in web and mobile solutions development, with a focus on achieving tangible results for clients. It was there that I gained my first experience right after completing my technical course. My responsibilities involved conducting tests, monitoring project progress, and collaborating with clients to understand and filter their demands. Working in synergy with cross-functional teams, I absorbed valuable insights into best practices and the key tools utilized by each domain, which proved to be fundamental for the outset of my career.
en.madeinweb-2: Roughly a year later, I transitioned into the development field and worked as a Front-End developer on over 5 projects catering to medium and large-sized enterprises. I employed frameworks such as Vue, React, and Angular, adhering to the best practices in interface development. I collaborated with cross-functional teams, maintaining close communication with Back-End and Design teams, and also engaged with AWS for cloud computing solutions.
en.scipopulis: Scipopulis specializes in smart cities and urban mobility. I served as a Full-Stack Developer, spearheading a Meteor.js project. I revitalized the architecture, embracing an event-driven API with WebSockets, enhancing performance while minimizing redundancy. I upgraded the front-end to Vue.js, ensuring real-time data.
en.compass: At Compass, part of the UOL group and specializes in delivering high-quality digital experiences, service integration, and solutions, I work as a Web Developer. Currently engaged in a project for Vivo. My approach aligns with agile methodologies, ensuring quality through testing and collaboration with specialized teams. Furthermore, I provide support and develop solutions within the Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) environment, including integrations with external systems, while overseeing the development of essential components and services. I also utilize Java and Vue.js.
en.footnote: This website is currently under construction and refinement. Soon, it will serve as a repository where I'll share my professional experiences, portfolio of works, and insightful articles. If you're interested in collaborating, partnering, or just discussing ideas, please don't hesitate to get in touch with me.
en.github-code: If you have any suggestions or encounter any bugs:
